title: How to Dye Your Hair with Powdered Drink Mix

steps.headline: Pick your color: any color you want your hair to be!
steps.description: Make sure the powder is unsweetened.

steps.headline: Get 2 cups of water and bring it to a boil.
steps.description: Add in 3 packs of your drink mix! You can search up Kool Aid color chart for colors!

steps.headline: Dip your hair in when it's still hot.
steps.description: For blond hair, leave it 5 minutes. For light brown, leave it 10 minutes and for dark brown or black hair, go 20 to 30 minutes or more.

steps.headline: Take your hair out and dry with towel.
steps.description: Then blow dry and do not wash until 24 hours have passed. Now you have beautiful dyed hair!
